title: STAT+: Why are hospitals throwing away ‘digital gold’?
description: Health system lawyers are silent on why hospitals don't keep AI scribe transcripts for quality and accuracy research.
content: Health system lawyers are silent on why hospitals don't keep AI scribe transcripts for quality and accuracy research.
